name: Custom icon size
description: change the size of your icons!

icon-size-overall.name: Overall size
icon-size-overall.description: Changes the size of the icon (irrelevant if "Split X & Y" is on)

icon-size-extra-enabled.name: Split X & Y
icon-size-extra-enabled.description: Whether to split the X & Y or not

icon-size-x.name: Scale X
icon-size-x.description: The scale of the icon on the X axis

icon-size-y.name: Scale Y
icon-size-y.description: The scale of the icon on the Y axis
